action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of New Jersey (for himself, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Jolly, and Mr. Fattah) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Act of 2005, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Reauthorization Act of 2015.

section.header: Amendments to the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Act of 2005

subsection.text: Section 2 of the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 274k note) is amended in subsection (h)—

subparagraph.text: by striking $23,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2011 through 2014 and; and
by inserting before the period at the end the following: and $23,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2016 through 2020; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking 2011 through 2015 and inserting 2015 through 2020.

subsection.text: Section 379B of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 274m) is amended by striking 2011 through 2014 and inserting 2016 through 2020.
